m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- February 10th, 2013 by Zachary Shahan   There’s a certain issue regarding solar policy that often gets to me. I’ve tackled it in several ways, but the policy idea below is one of the more intriguing of options, in my opinion. It stems from research done by academics from the University of Albany, George Washington University, and Clean Power Research; an article from the Institute for Local Self-Reliance ; and a policy put in place by Austin Energy .
